name: Barbell Hip Thrust
setup: Sit with upper back against bench, barbell over hips
Use pad for comfort across hip crease
Feet flat on floor, hip-width apart
Grip barbell with hands outside legs
steps: Drive through heels to thrust hips up
Squeeze glutes hard at top position
Create straight line from knees to shoulders
Pause briefly with full glute contraction
Lower barbell and hips with control
cues: Drive the hips to the ceiling
mistakes: Feet too close or too far
safety: Use proper pad placement. Start light to learn movement pattern. Avoid hyperextension.

prescriptionHints.load: Start 65-95 lb, progress based on strength
prescriptionHints.notes: Premier loaded glute exercise - prioritize quality over load

joints.notes: Focus on glute engagement rather than back extension. Use pad for hip comfort.
